en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The meeting covered the issues with different kinds of mics, progress on the Aurora project, effectiveness of spectral subtraction, adding parameter to spectral coefficient, and studying energy in the data, along with a short discussion on student housing. The team thought that the LDA was doing well for the Aurora project, where the team had made good progress. The linear normalization was not as good. For spectral subtraction, the team discussed recreating data with FFT of combining the Weiner filtering with the signal subspace. The team had not made much progress on using spectral coefficients for voice-unvoice. The current approach was to study the variance, so other ideas were suggested. The meeting ended with a short discussion on student housing and a graduate student's interest in studying energy.
fr_summary: La runion a couvert les problmes lis aux diffrents types de micros, les progrs du projet Aurora, l'efficacit de la soustraction spectrale, l'ajout de paramtres au coefficient spectral et l'tude de l'nergie dans les donnes, ainsi qu'une brve discussion sur le logement tudiant. L'quipe a jug que l'ADL se dbrouillait bien pour le projet Aurora, o elle avait bien avanc. La normalisation linaire na pas t aussi bonne. Pour la soustraction spectrale, l'quipe a discut de la recration des donnes avec la FFT ou de la combinaison du filtrage de Weiner avec le sous-espace du signal. L'quipe n'avait pas fait beaucoup de progrs sur l'utilisation des coefficients spectraux pour le vocal-non vocal. L'approche actuelle tant d'tudier la variance, d'autres ides ont t suggres. La runion s'est termine par une brve discussion sur le logement tudiant et l'intrt d'un tudiant diplm pour l'tude de l'nergie.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about microphone issues
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur les problmes de microphone
en_summary: The professor pointed out that the lapel microphones were too close, so they were not good representative microphones. There was strong agreement that mics capture breath and other non-voice sounds since they were common.
fr_summary: Le professeur a soulign que les micros-cravates taient trop proches, et donc que ce n'taient pas de bons micros reprsentatifs. Il y avait un fort accord sur le fait que les micros captent le souffle et d'autres sons non vocaux puisqu'ils sont courants.

So you can try this as a simple test with uh, the L S command. So you can say " run dash command L S ", and, um, it 'll actually export that LS command to some machine in the institute, and um, do an LS on your current directory. Now th one of the nice things is that uh, each machine that's part of the P - make and Customs network has attributes associated with it. Uh, attributes like how much memory the machine has, what its speed is, what its operating system, and when you use something like " run command ", you can specify those attributes for your program. For example if you only want your thing to run under Linux, you can give it the Linux attribute, and then it will find the fastest available Linux machine and run it on that. So. You can control where your jobs go, to a certain extent, all the way down to an individual machine. Each machine has an attribute which is the name of itself. So you can give that as an attribute and it 'll only run on that. If there's already a job running, on some machine that you 're trying to select, your job will get queued up, and then when that resource, that machine becomes available, your job will get exported there. en_query: What did PhD F think about computational resources?
fr_query: Que pense Doctorat F des ressources informatiques ?
en_summary: PhD F explained that he mistakenly had run his tasks on all the available compute instances. There was not enough computational resources going around. New computers were coming soon, but people would have to learn to share until then. It was important not to saturate computational resources. He also told the team how to properly queue tasks.
fr_summary: Doctorat F a expliqu qu'il avait excut par erreur ses tches sur toutes les instances de calcul disponibles. Il n'y avait pas assez de ressources informatiques en circulation. De nouveaux ordinateurs arriveront bientt, mais d'ici l, les gens devront apprendre  partager. Il tait important de ne pas saturer les ressources de calcul. Il a galement expliqu  l'quipe comment mettre correctement les tches en file d'attente.

en_query: What did the professor say about the workshop?
fr_query: Qu'a dit le professeur  propos de l'atelier ?
en_summary: The professor recalled that at a workshop at Hopkins or Rutgers, twenty-five participants were running their tasks on twenty-five machines. Things would have been better if they ran tasks on their own machine. He was adding to PhD F's remarks on students in the team doing a similar thing.
fr_summary: Le professeur a rappel que lors d'un atelier  Hopkins ou Rutgers, vingt-cinq participants excutaient leurs tches sur vingt-cinq machines. Les choses auraient t meilleures s'ils excutaient des tches sur leur propre machine. Il a ajout cela aux remarques de Doctorat F sur les tudiants de l'quipe faisant une chose similaire.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about spectral subtraction
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la soustraction spectrale
en_summary: The team was doing spectral subtraction with both scaling and GGT bins. There were pros and cons to both approaches. The professor suggested a simple spectral subtraction followed by a KL transformation. He also suggested using JRASTRA's technique which relied on adding some noise to get rid of noise. The team also suggested VTS techniques.
fr_summary: L'quipe a effectu une soustraction spectrale avec mise  l'chelle et bacs GGT . Il y avait des avantages et des inconvnients aux deux approches. Le professeur a suggr une simple soustraction spectrale suivie d'une transformation KL . Il a galement suggr d'utiliser la technique de JRASTRA consistant  ajouter un autre bruit pour se dbarrasser du bruit. L'quipe a galement propos des techniques VTS .

en_query: What were the topics talked about in the meeting?
fr_query: Quels ont t les sujets abords lors de la runion ?
en_summary: The group discussed recording equipment issues, including the purchase of two additional headsets and the prospect of getting a new base station and a set of wireless microphones to replace those wired microphones currently in use. Postdoc F presented the current status on transcriptions, and explained procedures for cleaning up transcripts and ensuring they conform with set conventions. PhD A briefly described his efforts to normalize loudness levels across speech channels to distinguish between foreground and background speech. Finally, the group discussed legal and procedural issues concerning the provision of transcripts to meeting participants for 'bleeping out' any sections of speech they want excluded from the Meeting Recorder database.
fr_summary: Le groupe a discut des problmes d'quipement d'enregistrement, y compris l'achat de deux casques supplmentaires et la perspective d'obtenir une nouvelle station de base et un ensemble de microphones sans fil pour remplacer les microphones filaires actuellement utiliss. Postdoc F a prsent l'tat actuel des transcriptions et a expliqu les procdures pour nettoyer les transcriptions et s'assurer qu'elles sont conformes aux conventions tablies. Doctorat A a brivement dcrit ses efforts pour normaliser les niveaux d'intensit sonore sur les canaux vocaux afin de faire la distinction entre la parole de premier plan et celle d'arrire-plan. Enfin, le groupe a discut des questions juridiques et procdurales concernant la fourniture de transcriptions aux participants  la runion pour  biffer  toutes les sections du discours qu'ils souhaitent exclure de la base de donnes de l'enregistreur de runion.

en_query: What was needed for the transcripts?
fr_query: Que fallait-il pour les transcriptions ?
en_summary: Efforts by Postdoc F are in progress to ensure that transcripts are clean (i.e. spell checked), channelized, and conform to set conventions regarding the coding of numbers, acronyms, and explicit comments (e.g. door slams, coughs, and laughter). Subsequent efforts by Postdoc F will be to tighten up boundaries on the time bins.
fr_summary: Des efforts sont dploys par Postdoc F pour s'assurer que les transcriptions sont propres (c'est--dire que l'orthographe est vrifie), canalises et conformes aux conventions tablies concernant le codage des nombres, des acronymes et des commentaires explicites (comme les claquements de porte, la toux et les rires). Les efforts ultrieurs de Postdoc F consisteront  resserrer les limites des intervalles de temps.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumer toute la runion.
en_summary: The group members mainly talked about the details of the belief-net framework. They first discussed the way to make the definition of user and situation clear and set up the standards, e.g., user thrift, based on user's budget. Then they turned to the discussion about endpoint decision. They mentioned approaches including setting features/modes of like selling, fixing and exhibiting, and this inspired the group members to design user compatibility nodes of which value would depend on the user status and situation. They further discussed Go-there decision, which is related to the previous idea using the similar set of the ontologies. Finally, they shifted the topic to different probability computation methods for belief-nets.
fr_summary: Les membres du groupe ont principalement parl des dtails du cadre de rseau de croyance. Ils ont d'abord discut de la manire de clarifier la dfinition de l'utilisateur et de la situation et d'tablir les normes, comme par exemple, l'conomie de l'utilisateur, base sur le budget de l'utilisateur. Ensuite, ils se sont tourns vers la discussion sur la dcision finale. Ils ont mentionn des approches comprenant la dfinition de fonctionnalits/modes de vente, de rparation et d'exposition similaires, ce qui a inspir les membres du groupe  concevoir des nuds de compatibilit utilisateur dont la valeur dpendrait du statut et de la situation de l'utilisateur. Ils ont ensuite discut de la dcision Go-there, qui est lie  l'ide prcdente en utilisant l'ensemble similaire des ontologies. Enfin, ils ont dplac le sujet vers diffrentes mthodes de calcul de probabilit pour les rseaux de croyances.

They tried to design a set of terms to describe the user's financial policy, such as thrift, average, spendy, or more finer scale ones.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about Go-there decision.
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la dcision Go-there.
en_summary: Grad E proposed the idea that Go-there decision was also worth thinking about. Professor B suggested that the decision could stick to the discourse properties as a placeholder. With regard to the lack of ontologies, Professor B thought that it could use the same properties like exhibiting and selling. Grad E doubted the choice of binary EVA values, but Professor B insisted that it was still necessary to make this choice. Then the group members discussed the layout of belief-nets, for example, the connection between Go-there nodes and other ones such as endpoints. And Professor B reminded them that the belief-nets should not have loops.

Professeur B a suggr que la dcision pourrait s'en tenir aux proprits du discours en tant qu'espace rserv. En ce qui concerne le manque d'ontologies, Professeur B a pens qu'il pourrait utiliser les mmes proprits comme exposer et vendre. Diplm E a dout du choix des valeurs binaires EVA , mais Professeur B a insist sur le fait qu'il tait encore ncessaire de faire ce choix. Ensuite, les membres du groupe ont discut de la disposition des rseaux de croyances, comme par exemple, la connexion entre les nuds Go-there et d'autres tels que les points finaux. Et Professeur B m'a rappel que les rseaux de croyance ne devraient pas avoir de boucles.

en_summary: Grad E first started the topic about Go-there decision, and then proposed the question about how to represent discourse. Though Professor B insisted on using true-and-false values, Grad E challenged Professor B's opinion by taking examples about whether people really wanted to go some place or not when they asked how to get there.
fr_summary: Diplm E a d'abord abord le sujet de la dcision Go-there, puis a propos la question sur la faon de reprsenter le discours. Bien que Professeur B ait insist sur l'utilisation des valeurs vrai et faux, Diplm E a contest l'opinion du Professeur B en prenant des exemples pour savoir si les gens voulaient vraiment aller quelque part ou non lorsqu'ils demandaient comment s'y rendre.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about probability computation.
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur le calcul des probabilits.
en_summary: Professor B first emphasized the necessity of combining influences mathematically and asked Grad D to further explain the potential solutions. Then the students discussed the computation methods including weighted combination and mixture of experts, based on the mechanism of belief-nets. But there was no consensus on which method should be applied in belief-nets.
fr_summary: Professeur B a d'abord insist sur la ncessit de combiner mathmatiquement les influences et a demand  Diplm D d'expliquer davantage les solutions possibles. Ensuite, les tudiants ont discut des mthodes de calcul, y compris la combinaison pondre et le mlange d'experts, bass sur le mcanisme des rseaux de croyances. Mais il n'y avait pas de consensus sur la mthode  appliquer dans les rseaux de croyances.

en_query: What did Grad D say about mixture of experts when discussing probability computation?
fr_query: Qu'a dit Diplm D au sujet du mlange d'experts lorsqu'il a discut du calcul des probabilits ?
en_summary: Grad D first said that different experts were reliable in different situations and it was necessary to organically combine them to make the network adapt to diverse situations. The network could be divided into several parts and the network would decide which of the experts would be trusted in this particular situation. Grad D then answered other group members' questions about the layout of mixture of expert models and their detailed computation process.
fr_summary: Diplm D a d'abord dit que diffrents experts taient fiables dans diffrentes situations et qu'il tait ncessaire de les combiner organiquement pour que le rseau s'adapte  diverses situations. Le rseau pourrait tre divis en plusieurs parties et le rseau dciderait  quel expert faire confiance dans cette situation particulire. Diplm D a ensuite rpondu aux questions des autres membres du groupe sur la disposition du mlange de modles experts et leur processus de calcul dtaill.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The group discussed the first version of the Bayes-net used to work out a user's intentions when asking for directions from a navigation device. Three intentions were identified: Vista (to view), Enter (to visit) and Tango (to approach). The structure of the belief-net comprises, firstly, a feature layer, which includes linguistic, discourse and world knowledge information that can be gleaned from the data. It is possible for these variables to form thematic clusters( eg "entrance", "type of object", "verb"), each one with a separate middle layer. At this stage, all the actual probabilities are ad-hoc and hand-coded. However, there has been progress in the design and organisation of experiments, that will eventually provide data more useful and appropriate for this task.
fr_summary: Le groupe a discut de la premire version du rseau Bayes utilis pour dterminer les intentions d'un utilisateur lorsqu'il demande des directions  partir d'un appareil de navigation. Trois intentions ont t identifies : Vista (voir), Enter (visiter) et Tango (s'approcher). La structure du rseau de croyances comprend, premirement, une couche de caractristiques, qui comprend des informations linguistiques, de discours et de connaissance du monde qui peuvent tre glanes  partir des donnes. Il est possible que ces variables forment des groupes thmatiques (comme  entre ,  type d'objet ,  verbe ), chacun avec une couche intermdiaire distincte.  ce stade, toutes les probabilits relles sont ad hoc et codes  la main. Cependant, des progrs ont t raliss dans la conception et l'organisation d'expriences, qui finiront par fournir des donnes plus utiles et plus appropries pour cette tche.

en_summary: It is necessary for the belief-net to have at least one layer of nodes between the features and the final output. This makes the structure more flexible in terms of coding feature-layer probabilities.

en_query: What was the next step on features?
fr_query: Quelle a t la prochaine tape concernant les fonctionnalits ?
en_summary: The next stage is to refine the set of feature nodes and identify possible clusters. Although, in theory, traditional AI plan recognition techniques could also be helpful for inferring intentions, the schemas involved are too elaborate for this task.

Bien qu'en thorie, les techniques traditionnelles de reconnaissance de plans d'IA puissent galement tre utiles pour dduire des intentions, les schmas impliqus sont trop labors pour cette tche.

en_query: Summarize what was said on intentionality
fr_query: Rsumer ce qui a t dit sur l'intentionnalit
en_summary: There was a demonstration of the structure and the function of a toy version of the belief-net for the intentionality task. The features nodes include things like prosody, discourse, verb choice, "landmark-iness" of a building, time of day and whether the admission fee was discussed.

Les nuds de caractristiques incluent des lments tels que la prosodie, le discours, le choix des verbes,  le point de repre  d'un btiment, l'heure de la journe et si les frais d'admission ont t discuts.

en_query: How would the middle layer work?
fr_query: Comment fonctionnerait la couche intermdiaire ?
en_summary: The values of these nodes take feed into the middle layer nodes identified as hidden variables of the user/device interaction, such as whether the user is on tour, running an errand or in a hurry. These, in turn, help infer whether the user wants to see, enter or simply approach a building.

en_query: What was the importance of SmartKom?
fr_query: Quelle a t l'importance de SmartKom ?
en_summary: SmartKom, although it does not code for intentions as specified in this task, provides a model of the discourse, which can be useful for the detection of features through querying and anaphora resolution.
fr_summary: SmartKom, bien qu'il ne code pas pour les intentions comme spcifi dans cette tche, fournit un modle du discours, qui peut tre utile pour la dtection de caractristiques par l'interrogation et la rsolution d'anaphores.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The participants discussed results from the experiments that had been conducted. Switching between tasks in the same language had smaller errors than multilingual models. The professor thought that increasing the parameters of the net for larger multi-lingual models would be helpful. The team decided that they should experiment further with different linguistic features. They also discussed how they could speed up their work by relying on greater computational resources.
fr_summary: Les participants ont discut des rsultats des expriences menes. Le passage d'une tche  l'autre dans la mme langue comportait moins d'erreurs que les modles multilingues. Le professeur pensait qu'il serait utile d'augmenter les paramtres du rseau pour les modles multilingues plus grands. L'quipe a dcid qu'elle devrait exprimenter davantage avec diffrentes caractristiques linguistiques. Ils ont galement discut de la manire dont ils pourraient acclrer leur travail en s'appuyant sur de plus grandes ressources de calcul.

en_summary: Using multiple languages led to more diversity which potentially hindered the model performance. The professor was skeptical about discussing the results since they had not received any good ones so far.

en_query: What did PhD D explain about the multilingual model?

en_summary: PhD D explained that the multilingual model, trained on French, Spanish, and English, was trained with higher frame rates. It has slightly poorer results when delta was not used. All in all, the addition of English did not seem to help the model.

en_query: Summarize the discussion on managing the complexity of the model
fr_query: Rsumer la discussion sur la gestion de la complexit du modle
en_summary: The team discussed the size of the neural net, which was just a simple net. At the time, it had 27 outputs, but the professor recommended that they use a larger net, with perhaps more features. They discussed the effect that removing silent frames could have on the model. The professor recommended having a bigger hidden layer, though he did not think that would substantially improve performance. Currently, however, the team was facing computational limitations.
fr_summary: L'quipe a discut de la taille du rseau neuronal, qui n'tait qu'un simple rseau.  l'poque, il y avait 27 sorties, mais le professeur leur a recommand d'utiliser un rseau plus grand, avec peut-tre plus de fonctionnalits. Ils ont discut de l'effet que la suppression des cadres silencieux pourrait avoir sur le modle. Le professeur a recommand d'avoir une couche cache plus grande, bien qu'il ne pense pas que cela amliorerait considrablement les performances. Cependant, l'quipe a t confronte  des limitations de calcul.

en_query: What did the team discuss about IBM computers?
fr_query: De quoi l'quipe a-t-elle discut  propos des ordinateurs IBM  ?
en_summary: The team was concerned about the availability of computational resources. The Professor informed them that they had received two 550 megahertz processors by IBM. Though, they were originally expecting eight 800 megahertz processors.
fr_summary: L'quipe a t proccupe par la disponibilit des ressources informatiques. Le professeur les a informs qu'ils avaient reu deux processeurs de 550 mgahertz par IBM . Cependant, ils s'attendaient  l'origine  huit processeurs de 800 mgahertz.

en_query: What did the team think about delays?
fr_query: Qu'a pens l'quipe des retards ?
en_summary: The team talked about delays when discussing the removal of frames that were silent. This could possibly improve model performance at the cost of a small delay.
fr_summary: L'quipe a voqu les retards lors de la discussion sur la suppression des images silencieuses. Cela pourrait ventuellement amliorer les performances du modle au prix d'un lger retard.

en_query: What was the overall discussion of the meeting?
fr_query: Quelle a t la discussion gnrale de la runion ?
en_summary: In this meeting, the speakers addressed issues that related to their meeting annotation progress. They talked about the types and variability of the future meetings. This led to them speaking about how to use their recording equipment if they got groups outside of their own departments to record meetings. Additionally, they discussed how to handle the storage of meetings on disk. They eventually address how to handle speech overlap and speaker anonymity, which were two crucial issues.
fr_summary: Lors de cette runion, les confrenciers ont abord des questions lies  l'avancement de l'annotation de leur runion. Ils ont parl des types et de la variabilit des futures runions. Cela les a amens  parler de la manire d'utiliser leur quipement d'enregistrement s'ils demandaient  des groupes extrieurs  leurs propres services d'enregistrer des runions. De plus, ils ont expliqu comment grer le stockage des runions sur disque. Ils abordent finalement la manire de grer le chevauchement des discours et l'anonymat de lorateur, qui taient deux problmes cruciaux.

en_query: What was said on getting fluent English speakers?

en_summary: Postdoc E was championing the need to get proficient English speakers so as to allow for a stable language model. This did not mean limiting the type of accents that the speakers had but rather ensuring the speakers could proficiently follow the English grammar when they expressed themselves.
fr_summary: Postdoc E dfendait la ncessit d'avoir des anglophones comptents afin de permettre un modle linguistique stable. Cela ne signifiait pas limiter le type d'accents des orateurs, mais plutt s'assurer que les orateurs pouvaient parfaitement suivre la grammaire anglaise lorsqu'ils s'exprimaient.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The meeting was taken up by discussion about a thesis proposal and a talk about to take place at EML. It was advised that more emphasis should be put on the role of construal in the understanding of metaphor and metonymy. Base constructions deal with the norm, while further general domain mechanisms determine how the constructions are invoked depending on the context. Several potential examples of polysemy were discussed in detail: "walk/run into", "on the bus", "out of film", "where is X?". However, none of them was an example of lexical polysemy resolved by construal straightforward enough to include in the proposal; the tourist domain is not metaphor rich.
fr_summary: La runion a t suivie d'une discussion sur un projet de thse et d'une confrence sur le point d'avoir lieu  l'EML. Il a t conseill de mettre davantage l'accent sur le rle de l'interprtation dans la comprhension de la mtaphore et de la mtonymie. Les constructions de base traitent de la norme, tandis que d'autres mcanismes de domaine gnraux dterminent comment les constructions sont invoques en fonction du contexte. Plusieurs exemples potentiels de polysmie ont t discuts en dtail :  marcher/courir dans ,  dans le bus ,  hors du film ,  o est X ? . Cependant, aucun d'entre eux n'tait un exemple de polysmie lexicale rsolue par une interprtation suffisamment simple pour tre incluse dans la proposition; le domaine touristique n'est pas riche en mtaphores.

en_query: Whats the thesis about?
fr_query: De quoi parle la thse ?
en_summary: The thesis proposal presents the idea of "construal" and makes claims as to how inferences are drawn in a probabilistic relational model by using information from the ontology, situation, user and discourse models. It was advised that more emphasis should be put on the role of construal in the understanding of metaphor and metonymy.
fr_summary: La proposition de thse prsente l'ide d'  interprtation  et affirme comment les infrences sont tires dans un modle relationnel probabiliste en utilisant des informations provenant des modles d'ontologie, de situation, d'utilisateur et de discours. Il a t conseill de mettre davantage l'accent sur le rle de l'interprtation dans la comprhension de la mtaphore et de la mtonymie.

en_query: What was said about EML talk?
fr_query: Qu'a-t-il t dit  propos du discours EML  ?
en_summary: The talk will present the work that is currently being done at ICSI including examples of inference of user intentions and of the recordings of the on-going data collection. The talk will also outline the theoretical (X-schemas, image schemas, Bayes-nets) and neural background.

en_query: What was said about the talk and neurons?
fr_query: Qu'a-t-on dit de la conversation et des neurones ?
en_summary: As the talk at EML will also refer to a theoretical framework, it was suggested that along with presenting NTL and the piece on mirror neurons, it also alludes to relevant fMRI work. The neural side of the research could be of interest to various groups. The language analysis itself will be introduced in terms of image schemas. On the other hand, it was arranged for more feedback on the thesis proposal to be sent by email. The latest version of the construction formalism will also be needed to complete the presentation.
fr_summary: Comme l'expos  l'EML fera galement rfrence  un cadre thorique, il a t suggr qu'en plus de prsenter NTL et l'article sur les neurones miroirs, il fasse galement allusion  des travaux pertinents sur le fMRI . L'aspect neuronal de la recherche pourrait intresser divers groupes. L'analyse du langage elle-mme sera introduite en termes de schmas d'images. D'autre part, il a t prvu que plus de commentaires sur la proposition de thse soient envoys par courrier lectronique. La dernire version du formalisme de construction sera galement ncessaire pour complter la prsentation.

en_query: What was the general discussion of the meeting?
fr_query: Quelle a t la discussion gnrale de la runion ?
en_summary: A pressing concern for the group is the DARPA meeting in July, which is only a short time away, and for which they would like to have some progress. PLP results for the front-end look good, with the group also reporting progress in segmentation: Thilo's segmenter will now be used and ways of improving performance investigated; The classifier segmentation is progressing well, especially in the use of prosody for identifying interruption. Work on the front end continues, with improvements of 3-5% being made.
fr_summary: Une proccupation urgente pour le groupe est la runion de la DARPA en juillet, qui est dans peu de temps, et pour laquelle ils aimeraient avoir des progrs. Les rsultats PLP pour le front-end semblent bons, le groupe signalant galement des progrs en matire de segmentation : le segmenteur de Thilo sera dsormais utilis et les moyens d'amliorer les performances tudis ; La segmentation des classificateurs progresse bien, notamment dans l'utilisation de la prosodie pour identifier les interruptions. Le travail sur le front-end se poursuit, avec des amliorations de 3  5 % en cours.

en_summary: For the DARPA meeting in July, the group proposed that they should have the question answering mock-up and transcriber interface ready for then, and also have data available.

en_query: Summarize the meeting
fr_query: Rsumer la runion
en_summary: The team was coming close to finalizing the model for Aurora. They were still trying to make some improvements to improve their score. The team began with a discussion about how reverberation could be better accounted for. The professor thought that experimenting with different filters could help achieve a better signal-to-noise ratio. The new system for estimating silence probabilities that the team had added to the model was very effective, but it created a 220ms latency in the VAD. The team was not sure what kinds of constraints would be placed on latency eventually. They wanted to play it safe. The models, over all, were performing well, though the team intended to keep improving them. The team was also trying to figure out how to deal with different kinds of background noise. The meeting ended with a discussion of logistical issues.
fr_summary: L'quipe tait sur le point de finaliser le modle d'Aurora. Ils essayaient encore d'apporter quelques perfectionnements pour amliorer leur score. L'quipe a commenc par une discussion sur la faon dont la rverbration pourrait tre mieux prise en compte. Le professeur a considr que l'exprimentation de diffrents filtres pourrait aider  obtenir un meilleur rapport signal sur bruit. Le nouveau systme d'estimation des probabilits de silence que l'quipe avait ajout au modle tait trs efficace, mais il a cr une latence de 220 ms dans le VAD . L'quipe n'tait pas sre des types de contraintes qui seraient finalement imposes  la latence. Ils voulaient jouer la scurit. Les modles, dans l'ensemble, fonctionnaient bien, mme si l'quipe avait l'intention de continuer  les amliorer. L'quipe essayait galement de comprendre comment grer les diffrents types de bruit de fond. La runion s'est termine par une discussion sur les questions logistiques.

en_query: What did the professor think about the neural net?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le professeur du rseau de neurones ?
en_summary: The professor was interested in knowing what impact the neural net had in the older models which did not have pure features. The professor believed it was worthwhile to improve the net, though he also expressed that nets were occasionally over used.

en_query: What did the team discuss about the most noisy cases?
fr_query: De quoi l'quipe a-t-elle discut concernant les cas les plus bruyants ?
en_summary: The team thought that the most noisy cases were the distant microphone testing. That is when there were non-stationary noises in the background, like from a car, a babble or subway. These presented a unique challenge for the model that could potentially be best solved with a neural net.

Celles-ci prsentaient un dfi unique pour le modle qui pourrait potentiellement tre mieux rsolu avec un rseau neuronal.

fr_query: Que dit Doctorat C sur la rpartition de la latence ?
en_summary: PhD C explained that the silence probabilities had a 100ms delay, the delta at the input had a 40ms delay, and a 10ms delay was created by LDA filters.
fr_summary: Doctorat C a expliqu que les probabilits de silence avaient un retard de 100 ms, le delta  l'entre avait un retard de 40 ms et un retard de 10 ms tait cr par les filtres LDA .

en_summary: Project Manager invites teammates to brainstorm animal characteristics on remote control function and suggest a reflection on user experience to improve technical function design. Price goal is 25 Euro, profit aim is fifty million Euro, and sales goal is four million. To summarize, the function design will be user-friendly and practical, in which the technical function will be portable phone based, hand-sized, light with limited but all-functioned buttons.
fr_summary: Le chef de projet invite ses coquipiers  rflchir aux caractristiques des animaux sur la fonction de contrle  distance et  proposer une rflexion sur l'exprience utilisateur pour amliorer la conception de la fonction technique. L'objectif de prix est de 25 euros, l'objectif de profit est de cinquante millions d'euros et l'objectif de vente est de quatre millions. Pour rsumer, la conception de la fonction sera conviviale et pratique, et la fonction technique sera base sur un tlphone portable, de la taille d'une main, lgre avec des boutons limits mais tous fonctionnels.

Marketing suggested a horse and Project Manager thought they should design a remote control that's water resistant, strong and furry. Therefore, Project Manager encouraged teammates to reflect on experience when designing its function and format.

At the first beginning, User Interface suggested bigger, while Project Manager suggested a hand-sized device. Considering the light feature and putting noise on it, User Interface thought it would be feasible to make it mobile with a target price at 25 Euros.

Compte tenu de la fonction d'clairage et du bruit, le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a pens qu'il serait possible de le rendre mobile avec un prix cible de 25 euros.

en_query: What did Project Manager think of the cost constraints on the telly screen with the programming function?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le chef de projet des contraintes de cot sur l'cran de tl avec la fonction de programmation ?
en_summary: Since User Interface initially suggested less button feature on the remote control, so Project Manager suggested a telly screen like what phones have. And User Interface mentioned about the master control in electronic houses. However, User Interface thought it is a bit expensive to create this feature, but Marketing mentioned the similar screen in phones is in the acceptable cost range. So, Project Manager agreed and suggested further discussion in the coming meeting.
fr_summary: tant donn que le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a initialement suggr moins de fonctionnalits de bouton sur la tlcommande, le chef de projet a suggr un cran de tl comme celui des tlphones. Et le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a mentionn le contrle principal dans les maisons lectroniques. Cependant, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a estim qu'il tait un peu coteux de crer cette fonctionnalit, mais le responsable marketing a mentionn que l'cran similaire des tlphones se situait dans la fourchette de cots acceptable. Ainsi, le chef de projet a accept et a suggr une discussion plus approfondie lors de la prochaine runion.

en_query: Why did Project Manager suggest having a clip on the remote control?
fr_query: Pourquoi le chef de projet a-t-il suggr d'avoir un clip sur la tlcommande ?
en_summary: User Interface reiterated that the remote control should have a robust and water resistant function. Marketing also mentioned a good tactile feel for the remote control function, which doesn't make hand sweat a lot. Therefore, Project Manager suggested a clip feature on the remote control so that people can clip it to their device.

Le responsable marketing a galement mentionn une bonne sensation tactile pour la fonction de tlcommande, qui ne fait pas beaucoup transpirer la main. Par consquent, chef de projet a suggr une fonction de clip sur la tlcommande afin que les utilisateurs puissent le clipser sur leur appareil.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: This is the fourth meeting of the design group. The group firstly introduced a prototype which contained the characteristics determined at the last meeting. Then Project Manager pointed out that since the production costs were over budget, they should reduce costs by leaving out solar cells, not using voice recognition and changing the button material into plastics. Then the group went through the evaluation criteria of the product. They thought the remote control should be fancy, innovative, easy to use, easy to find and spongy and evaluated the prototype with these criteria. When evaluating the project, the group considered that it was tempered by the choice of components and the price. Eventually, the group decided to redesign the product.
fr_summary: Il s'agit de la quatrime runion du groupe de conception. Le groupe a d'abord prsent un prototype qui contenait les caractristiques dtermines lors de la dernire runion. Ensuite, le chef de projet a soulign que, puisque les cots de production dpassaient le budget, ils devraient rduire les cots en omettant les cellules solaires, en n'utilisant pas la reconnaissance vocale et en changeant le matriau du bouton en plastique. Ensuite, le groupe a pass en revue les critres d'valuation du produit. Ils pensaient que la tlcommande devait tre sophistique, innovante, facile  utiliser, facile  trouver et spongieuse et ont valu le prototype avec ces critres. Lors de l'valuation du projet, le groupe a considr qu'il tait tempr par le choix des composants et le prix. Finalement, le groupe a dcid de repenser le produit.

Then User Interface supposed that the buttons could be made of plastics and Industrial Designer proposed to make the remote control straight and simple.

Ensuite, le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a suppos que les boutons pouvaient tre en plastique et le designer industriel a propos de rendre la tlcommande simple et directe.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: After a brief summary of the last meeting, the team discussed the conceptual design for new remote control, which covered the properties, materials, user interface and trend watching. Marketing shared feedback about the design of the device. Industrial Designer gave a presentation on the design and availability of actual components, whereas User Interface led the discussion about customer needs and feasibility on design and competitors' study. A final decision was reached regarding the design of the remote control such as using kinetic charging and a rubber cover.
fr_summary: Aprs un bref rsum de la dernire runion, l'quipe a discut du design conceptuel de la nouvelle tlcommande, qui couvrait les proprits, les matriaux, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur et l'observation des tendances. Le responsable marketing a partag ses commentaires sur la conception de l'appareil. Le designer industriel a fait une prsentation sur la conception et la disponibilit des composants rels, tandis que le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a men la discussion sur les besoins des clients et la faisabilit de la conception et de l'tude des concurrents. Une dcision finale a t prise concernant la conception de la tlcommande, comme l'utilisation de la charge cintique et d'un couvercle en caoutchouc.

en_query: What were the final decisions made by the team?
fr_query: Quelles ont t les dcisions finales prises par l'quipe ?
en_summary: Kinetic charging will be adopted with LCD display on the top side of the flip top and rubberized buttons, such as volume control and channel control on the bottom. Two separate circuit boards will be joined by wires for standard and complex buttons respectively. Fruit and vegetable colours, such as chilli red or tomato red will be used for the rubber cover and the case will be plastic. The company logo will be incorporated into the design. The team hoped to incorporate voice recognition but financial feasibility will have to be checked and whistles or beepers could be used if not feasible.
fr_summary: La charge cintique sera adopte avec un cran LCD sur le dessus du rabat et des boutons caoutchouts, tels que le contrle du volume et le contrle des chanes en bas. Deux circuits imprims spars seront relis par des fils pour les boutons standard et complexes respectivement. Des couleurs de fruits et lgumes, telles que le rouge piment ou le rouge tomate, seront utilises pour le couvercle en caoutchouc et le botier sera en plastique. Le logo de l'entreprise sera intgr au design. L'quipe esprait intgrer la reconnaissance vocale, mais la faisabilit financire devra tre vrifie et des sifflets ou des bips pourraient tre utiliss si ce n'est pas possible.

en_query: What did the team decide on in the last meeting?

en_summary: Teletext will not be used and there will not be a control for everything. The buttons should be easy to find. The image of the company is to be incorporated in the design and a flip design is decided. Voice recognition is left out. The shape of the remote will be different than normal, like a shell or something along those lines. An alarm will be added in case the remote is lost. The target market will be young business people.

dialogue:
marketing: Thank you. There we go. Okay um so we decided on our market and so this feedback from the marketing department is really about trend watching. Um the methods we used to decide on uh current trends and so on, market trends, were that we did our traditional uh our usual market research study uh with a hundred subjects and the the general feedback from them is that the most im uh w I'm sorry I'm slightly tongue-tied after lunch,
user interface: {vocalsound}
project manager: It's okay.
industrial designer: {vocalsound}
marketing: sorry Project Manager. Um we decided on the most important aspect i uh required in a remote control device and we'll come to that later. So that was one of the first things we did. Also with our company um being forerunners in uh putting fashion into technology, we also looked at a fashion update um using our consultants on fashion and design in Paris and Milan. Uh so the general findings from that was uh in the market trends the most important aspect for remote controls were people want a fancy look and feel, rather than the the current functional look and feel of remote controls. They also also want a remote control to be technologically innovative, and of course, as we predicted, that it should be easy to use. Now I should point out that the first of those findings, fancy look and feel, is the most important, is twice as important as the second, technologically innovative, which is in turn twice as important as being easy to use. So possibly that the feature that we put first is actually third is still important, but it's third in order of preference for the the subject group we looked at.
project manager: Yeah.
marketing: Okay, um, now the fashion update which relates to very personal preferences among our subject group, um we found from our um consultants in Paris and Milan who des attended all the design and fashion fairs there, that fruit and vegetables are going to be the theme for clothes, shoes and furniture. So should we be thinking of using something like that in our remote control design too? There also seems to be um a trend towards a spongy feel to materials, uh again in contrast to last year. So a lot of interesting feedback there, both from our market research departments and from our people in Paris and Milan. Be interesting to see what our design people make of that.
user interface: 'Kay.
en_query: Summarize the discussion about the feedback on the design of the remote control device.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur les commentaires sur la conception du dispositif de tlcommande.
en_summary: Market research was done with a hundred subjects and Marketing concluded the most important aspect required in the device is a fancy look and feel. The second and third important aspects are technologically innovative and being easy to use. Fruits and vegetables can be taken into consideration when thinking about design themes as they were the themes of fashion fairs in Paris and Milan. There is also a trend towards a spongy feel to materials.
fr_summary: Une tude de march a t ralise auprs d'une centaine de sujets et le responsable marketing a conclu que l'aspect le plus important requis dans l'appareil est un aspect et une sensation de fantaisie. Les deuxime et troisime aspects importants sont technologiquement innovants et faciles  utiliser. Les fruits et lgumes peuvent tre pris en considration lors de la rflexion sur les thmes du design, car ils taient les thmes des salons de la mode  Paris et  Milan. Il y a aussi une tendance vers une sensation spongieuse des matriaux.

en_query: What are the actual components found in most remote controls that will be included in this remote design?
fr_query: Quels sont les composants rels trouvs dans la plupart des tlcommandes qui seront incluses dans cette conception de tlcommande ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer explained that TA11835 is a chip used in pretty much every remote control to send out standard signals based on the input. On the other hand, most current remotes use a silicone printed circuit board (PCB board) which connects the circuits so that the messages would be sent to the chip. The size should be decided as the board can be custom made.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a expliqu que TA11835 est une puce utilise dans presque toutes les tlcommandes pour envoyer des signaux standard bass sur l'entre. D'autre part, la plupart des tlcommandes actuelles utilisent une carte de circuit imprim en silicone (carte PCB) qui relie les circuits de sorte que les messages soient envoys  la puce. La taille doit tre dcide car la planche peut tre fabrique sur mesure.

en_query: What are the benefits and drawbacks for each battery option mentioned and what did Industrial Manager suggest to conserve battery life when discussing the design and availability of actual components?
fr_query: Quels sont les avantages et les inconvnients de chaque option de batterie mentionne et qu'a suggr le directeur industriel pour prserver la dure de vie de la batterie lors de la discussion sur la conception et la disponibilit des composants rels ?
en_summary: Standard AA and AAA are bulky but the cheapest. Dynamo and dual charging with normal batteries and solar charging take up too much space. Solar charging is the second cheapest but not resistant to dropping. Also, Project Manager believed it would limit the market. Kinetic charging is small and portable but market research should be done first. No rechargeable battery options were available. The remote could have a standby mode and the lights behind the buttons would be switched off after five or ten seconds when not in use.
fr_summary: Les standards AA et AAA sont volumineux mais les moins chers. La dynamo et la double charge avec des batteries normales et la charge solaire prennent trop de place. La recharge solaire est la deuxime moins chre mais elle ne rsiste pas aux chutes. De plus, le chef de projet pensait que cela limiterait le march. La charge cintique est petite et portable, mais une tude de march doit tre effectue en premier. Aucune option de batterie rechargeable n'tait disponible. La tlcommande pourrait avoir un mode veille et les lumires derrire les boutons seraient teintes aprs cinq ou dix secondes lorsqu'elles ne sont pas utilises.

Marketing suggested making the basic mould out of plastic with a rubber cover, which would give a spongy feel and be a cheap way to change the look of the device. Industrial Designer, User Interface and Project Manager quickly jumped on board with this idea.

en_query: Summarize the design and availability of actual components.
fr_query: Rsumez la conception et la disponibilit des composants rels.
en_summary: The chip TA11835 and PCB board will be used in the device. The use of kinetic charging was agreed by the team with a standby mode to save battery. The case of the device would be in plastic and would have a changeable rubber cover. LCD screens will be adopted. The idea of adding a stylus or a mirror to the device was rejected.
fr_summary: La puce TA11835 et la carte PCB seront utilises dans l'appareil. L'utilisation de la charge cintique a t convenue par l'quipe avec un mode veille pour conomiser la batterie. Le botier de l'appareil serait en plastique et aurait un couvercle en caoutchouc interchangeable. Les crans LCD seront adopts. L'ide d'ajouter un stylet ou un miroir  l'appareil a t rejete.

en_query: What are the designs of normal remotes and how can the new remote be different from the normal ones?
fr_query: Quelles sont les conceptions des tlcommandes normales et comment la nouvelle tlcommande peut-elle tre diffrente des tlcommandes normales ?
en_summary: Mostly black and white colours, the normal ones are monotonous without consistency between models, and the buttons are very disorganized. The new remote will have a graphic user interface in the middle of the flip top and certain standard buttons with vibrant fruit colours. A newly developed speech recognition feature can be incorporated in the device and the idea was endorsed by customers. User Interface gave an example of using the feature - locating the remote. The idea was well-received by the team.
fr_summary: Couleurs majoritairement noir et blanc, les normales sont monotones sans cohrence entre les modles, et les boutons sont trs dsorganiss. La nouvelle tlcommande aura une interface utilisateur graphique au milieu du flip top et certains boutons standard avec des couleurs de fruits vibrantes. Une fonction de reconnaissance vocale nouvellement dveloppe peut tre intgre  l'appareil et l'ide a t approuve par les clients. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a donn un exemple d'utilisation de la fonctionnalit - localisation de la tlcommande. L'ide a t bien accueillie par l'quipe.

en_query: How can the cost be cut down if the speech recognition feature is adopted?
fr_query: Comment le cot peut-il tre rduit si la fonction de reconnaissance vocale est adopte ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer said that it would be cheaper to re-manufacture if these parts were already in stock. Project Manager pointed out that the other materials used were relatively cheap and simple. Though the LCD would be expensive, it would be cheaper with black and white than full colour so User Interface suggested that they could start off with black and white and upgrade later.

Bien que l'cran LCD soit cher, il serait moins cher en noir et blanc qu'en couleur, donc le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr qu'ils pourraient commencer avec le noir et blanc et mettre  niveau plus tard.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The meeting, which was held at the early stage of the project, focused on the product features and work division. Project manager proposed that the remote control had to be imaginative, trendy, user-friendly and international. Besides, the production cost should be no more than 12.5 Euros. In terms of the price, all members agreed that 25 Euros would be reasonable. They also clarified each person's duty. In the time remaining, the members did some tool training by drawing their favourite animals on the whiteboard.
fr_summary: La runion, qui s'est tenue au dbut du projet, s'est concentre sur les caractristiques du produit et la division du travail. Le chef de projet a propos que la tlcommande soit imaginative, tendance, conviviale et internationale. De plus, le cot de production ne devrait pas dpasser 12,5 euros. En termes de prix, tous les membres ont convenu que 25 euros seraient raisonnables. Ils ont galement clarifi le devoir de chacun. Pendant le temps qu'il restait, les membres ont suivi une formation aux outils en dessinant leurs animaux prfrs sur le tableau blanc.

Le concepteur d'interface utilisateur se concentrerait sur les besoins des utilisateurs et la relation entre les utilisateurs et la tlcommande. Le responsable marketing donnerait aux concepteurs d'interfaces et aux concepteurs industriels des tendances sur ce qui devrait tre fait et ce que les utilisateurs aimeraient avoir.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: This meeting was about the functional design of the remote control. Firstly, Marketing gave a presentation on functional requirements. Group decided to focus on the fancy and fashionable look, usability, and different colors. Next, User Interface gave a presentation on the technical function design. Also, the group discussed this topic, and they decided to design the menu buttons of the remote similar to the mobile phone. Then, Industrial Designer gave a presentation on the working design. Group mates discussed deciding on the use of LED light on the buttons to indicate the transmitting of the Morse code when pressing the button. They also decided to use a more intelligent chip than the standard one when the circuit was closed, it would produce the pattern. For the age group, they would target the age group below forty since it was a young market.
fr_summary: Cette runion portait sur la conception fonctionnelle de la tlcommande. Dans un premier temps, le responsable marketing a fait une prsentation sur les exigences fonctionnelles. Le groupe a dcid de se concentrer sur le look chic et  la mode, la convivialit et les diffrentes couleurs. Ensuite, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a fait une prsentation sur la conception de la fonction technique. En outre, le groupe a discut de ce sujet et a dcid de concevoir les boutons de menu de la tlcommande similaires au tlphone mobile. Ensuite, le designer industriel a fait une prsentation sur la conception de travail. Les membres du groupe ont discut de la dcision d'utiliser une lumire LED sur les boutons pour indiquer la transmission du code Morse lorsque vous appuyez sur le bouton. Ils ont galement dcid d'utiliser une puce plus intelligente que la puce standard lorsque le circuit tait ferm, cela produirait le motif. Pour le groupe d'ge, ils cibleraient le groupe d'ge infrieur  quarante ans car il s'agissait d'un march jeune.

fr_query: Rsumez la prsentation et la discussion sur les exigences fonctionnelles.
en_summary: Marketing gave some suggestions on the remote functional requirements based on marketing reports, which included a fancy look of the remote control, ease of use for elderly people, a button on the home station to trace its position, and speech recognition. So finally, the group mates suggested the usability and the color of the remote control based on Marketing's presentation.

Donc, finalement, les camarades du groupe ont suggr la convivialit et la couleur de la tlcommande en fonction de la prsentation du responsable marketing.

en_summary: When Marketing mentioned that they should make a new product that looked fancy, fashionable, and was easy to use for elderly users, User Interface suggested making sure that the remote control had better usability and could stand out by just being watched. Also, Marketing suggested a different color or different shape.
fr_summary: Lorsque le responsable marketing a mentionn qu'ils devraient crer un nouveau produit qui avait l'air chic,  la mode et facile  utiliser pour les utilisateurs gs, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr de s'assurer que la tlcommande avait une meilleure convivialit et pouvait se dmarquer simplement en tant regarde. En outre, le responsable marketing a suggr une couleur diffrente ou une forme diffrente.

en_query: Summarize the presentation and discussion on technical function design.
fr_query: Rsumez la prsentation et la discussion sur la conception des fonctions techniques.
en_summary: Firstly, User Interface suggested the group should stand up with a unique design like different shapes than usual. User Interface also suggested a new option for favorite channels and a menu button that could integrate with volume, the previous and next buttons. The group agreed to make the remote a bit smaller and would like to look at mobile phones when designing it.
fr_summary: Tout d'abord, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suggr que le groupe se tienne debout avec un design unique comme des formes diffrentes de celles d'habitude. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a galement suggr une nouvelle option pour les chanes prfres et un bouton de menu qui pourrait intgrer avec le volume, les boutons prcdent et suivant. Le groupe a accept de rendre la tlcommande un peu plus petite et aimerait se pencher sur les tlphones portables lors de sa conception.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: This is the third meeting of the design group. At first, Marketing revealed that ease of use, innovation and a fancy look and feel could be important to customers and the team discussed what colour and material they should use. Then Industrial Designer introduced three casing possibilities: uncurved, single-curved and double-curved. Next, the team talked about whether to use kinetic energy supply as an energy source. In terms of user interface controls, Industrial Designer proposed to add a scroll-wheel that could be integrated with buttons. Finally, the team summed up their decisions and Project Manager asked User Interface Designer to create a prototype next.
fr_summary: Il s'agit de la troisime runion du groupe de conception. Dans un premier temps, le responsable marketing a rvl que la facilit d'utilisation, l'innovation et un aspect et une sensation de fantaisie pouvaient tre importants pour les clients et l'quipe a discut de la couleur et du matriau  utiliser. Ensuite, le designer industriel a introduit trois possibilits de botier : non courb, simple courb et double courb. Ensuite, l'quipe a discut de l'opportunit d'utiliser l'nergie cintique comme source d'nergie. En termes de commandes d'interface utilisateur, le designer industriel a propos d'ajouter une molette de dfilement qui pourrait tre intgre  des boutons. Enfin, l'quipe a rsum ses dcisions et le chef de projet a demand au concepteur d'interface utilisateur de crer ensuite un prototype.

en_query: What's the decision of the whole meeting?
fr_query: Quelle est la dcision de toute la runion ?
en_summary: The team decided to make a single-curved remote control with colourful rubber. It would be powered by traditional batteries and solar. They would also add a scroll-wheel with some additional buttons. In addition, corporate identity should be embodied so the colours could be black and yellow. As they decided not to use an LCD display, a regular chip would be selected.

Ils ajouteraient galement une molette de dfilement avec quelques boutons supplmentaires. De plus, l'identit d'entreprise devrait tre incarne afin que les couleurs puissent tre le noir et le jaune. Comme ils ont dcid de ne pas utiliser d'cran LCD, une puce ordinaire serait slectionne.

en_query: Summarize the discussion about remote control style.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur le style de contrle  distance.
en_summary: Marketing revealed that the younger target group preferred colourful objects and soft material. Project Manager agreed and added that the remote control should be light and not too slippery. Then Industrial Designer introduced three casing possibilities: uncurved, single-curved and double-curved. Considering that uncurved design could be too dull and double-curved design would make it difficult to use scroll-wheels, the team chose the single-curved design.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a rvl que le groupe cible plus jeune prfrait les objets colors et les matriaux souples. Le chef de projet tait d'accord et a ajout que la tlcommande doit tre lgre et pas trop glissante. Ensuite, le designer industriel a introduit trois possibilits de botier : non courb, simple courb et double courb. Considrant que la conception non incurve pourrait tre trop terne et qu'une conception  double courbure rendrait difficile l'utilisation des molettes de dfilement, l'quipe a choisi la conception  simple courbe.

en_query: What did the group discuss about user interface controls of the remote control?
fr_query: Qua dit le groupe concernant les commandes de l'interface utilisateur de la tlcommande ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer proposed to use scroll-wheels, which could be integrated with buttons. User Interface doubted its practicability and then Project Manager proposed to integrate a scroll-bar on the side to mute the device. As they would not use an LCD display, a regular chip was enough.

en_query: Why did the team decide not to use LCD displays when discussing interface controls?
fr_query: Pourquoi l'quipe a-t-elle dcid de ne pas utiliser d'crans LCD lors des discussions sur les commandes d'interface ?
en_summary: Industrial Manager revealed that if LCD was used, they had to choose advanced chips. Project Manager thought it was within the budget and LCD displays could add extra high-tech feeling. User Interface then pointed out that they already had too many high-tech substances including scroll-wheels, voice recognition and a fancy look so they didn't need to use LCD displays.
fr_summary: Le directeur industriel a rvl que si l'cran LCD tait utilis, ils devaient choisir des puces avances. Le chef de projet a considr que c'tait dans les limites du budget et que les crans LCD pourraient ajouter une sensation de haute technologie supplmentaire. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a ensuite soulign qu'ils avaient dj trop de substances de haute technologie, notamment des molettes de dfilement, la reconnaissance vocale et un look sophistiqu, de sorte qu'ils n'avaient pas besoin d'utiliser des crans LCD.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: The team mainly made some adjustments to the remote control design to meet the new project requirements. The second meeting started with Project Manager who briefly went over the last meeting. Industrial Designer hoped to minimize the size of the battery. The team thus decided on a rechargeable one. User Interface desired to simplify the remote control style, cutting down unnecessary functions. According to the market research presented by Marketing, the team agreed on a trendy and user-friendly flip-top design. An alarm would be incorporated for detection in case the remote control was lost in the house.
fr_summary: L'quipe a principalement apport quelques ajustements  la conception de la tlcommande pour rpondre aux nouvelles exigences du projet. La deuxime runion a commenc avec le chef de projet qui a brivement pass en revue la dernire runion. Le designer industriel esprait minimiser la taille de la batterie. L'quipe a donc opt pour un rechargeable. Le concepteur de linterface utilisateur a souhait simplifier le style de la tlcommande, en rduisant les fonctions inutiles. Selon l'tude de march prsente par le reponsable marketing, l'quipe s'est mise d'accord sur un design flip-top tendance et convivial. Une alarme serait incorpore pour la dtection en cas de perte de la tlcommande dans la maison.

en_query: What did the group discuss about battery issues and flip top design?
fr_query: Qua dit le groupe concernant les problmes de batterie et la conception du couvercle rabattable ?
en_summary: On battery issue, Industrial Designer expressed a desire to minimize the size of the battery. Meanwhile, cost, power consumption, wireless range and data transmission were supposed to be considered. User Interface's presentation followed. The remote control design would be simplified and user-friendly. To make the style more trendy, User Interface decided on a flip-top model.
fr_summary: Concernant la question de la batterie, le designer industriel a exprim le souhait de minimiser la taille de la batterie. Pendant ce temps, le cot, la consommation d'nergie, la porte sans fil et la transmission de donnes taient censs tre pris en compte. La prsentation du concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a suivi. La conception de la tlcommande serait simplifie et conviviale. Pour rendre le style plus tendance, le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a opt pour un modle flip-top.

en_query: What did Industrial Designer think of triple A batteries when discussing battery issues and flip top design?
fr_query: Qu'a pens le designer industriel des batteries triple A lorsqu'il a discut des problmes de batterie et de la conception du couvercle rabattable ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer admitted that current remote controls were mostly powered by triple A batteries. However, Industrial Designer also pointed out that they were bulky, although they had been the smallest fit-in batteries at present. Industrial Designer expressed a desire to find a smaller alternative for triple A batteries.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel a admis que les tlcommandes actuelles taient principalement alimentes par des piles triple A. Cependant, le designer industriel a galement soulign qu'elles taient encombrantes, bien qu'elles aient t les plus petites batteries encastrables  l'heure actuelle. Le designer industriel a exprim le dsir de trouver une alternative plus petite pour les batteries triple A.

dialogue:
marketing: Okay, um, I'm going to look at the functional requirements from the marketing point of view and uh obviously our starting point with marketing is always market research. Um, so that's where we started, we used our our usability lab, the company's usability lab, we did our usual selection methods to get a cross-section of the general public, male and female, all age groups from fifteen upwards and um we observed them in the lab, just their general use of the remote control, you can see we had a hundred subjects there. Our findings, lots of findings, I've just summarised some of them here. The overall thing which I've I've got at the top there in italics is that users dislike the look and feel of current remote controls, so it has obvious design implications there. Um, we found that seventy five percent of users find most remote controls ugly. Eighty percent would spend more money when a remote control would look fancy, we were quite surprised by that finding, but um that's quite a high proportion of our our, you know, international target group are prepared to spend more money for something that's a bit nicer looking. Um, current remote controls do not match well with the operating behaviour of the user overall. For example, you can see below there, seventy five percent of users zap a lot,
user interface: Yeah.
marketing: so you've got your person sunk back in the sofa channel-hopping. So again there's power implications there. Um, fifty percent of users only use ten percent of the buttons, so again a big design issue there. Um and possibly we can also cut back on cost if we don't have so many functions actually on the remote control. Um the biggest frustrations that people found with regard to personal preferences were um something that you you mentioned earlier, uh remote controls are often lost in the room, it's a slipping down the back of the sofa type of thing, uh fifty percent were were particularly frustrated by that. Uh thirty four percent of people take said they take too much time to learn to use and I think that ties in with the um the previous finding of people only using ten percent of the buttons, they just can't be bothered to learn about the other functions. Um, um slightly more than a quarter of people said it was bad for uh repetitive strain injury. You know those small movements of the remote control can lead to kind of shoulder and elbow problems. Um the vast majority of the thirty five and under age group would like um a liquid crystal display and speech recognition, again that was to aid I think in uh when they've lost the actual remote control, some kind of speech recognition. Something we didn't put to them, but which I'm thinking of now is um even if perhaps the lost control can give off a bleep every now and again til you find it or a flashing light, possibly. Um, that trend reverses in the older age groups. en_query: Summarize the discussion about market research and adjustments due to new project requirements.
fr_query: Rsumez la discussion sur les tudes de march et les ajustements dus aux nouvelles exigences du projet.
en_summary: The market research presented by Marketing implicated that the remote control design was expected to be more stylish and less complicated. Project Manager added that an ideal model would be for TV only and have a corporate logo incorporated. To meet the requirements above, Industrial Designer recommended a touch screen panel. Marketing suggested that the remote control size could be adjusted due to physical differences among international users. The team gave up speech recognition, for it would cost a lot. An alarm would be incorporated for detection in case the remote control was lost in the house.
fr_summary: L'tude de march prsente par le responsable marketing impliquait que la conception de la tlcommande devait tre plus lgante et moins complique. Le chef de projet a ajout qu'un modle idal serait pour la tlvision uniquement et aurait un logo d'entreprise incorpor. Pour rpondre aux exigences ci-dessus, le designer industriel a recommand un cran tactile. Le responsable marketing a suggr que la taille de la tlcommande pourrait tre ajuste en raison des diffrences physiques entre les utilisateurs internationaux. L'quipe a renonc  la reconnaissance vocale, car cela coterait cher. Une alarme serait incorpore pour la dtection en cas de perte de la tlcommande dans la maison.

en_query: Why did Industrial Designer think of incorporating an alarm when discussing market research and adjustments due to new project requirements?
fr_query: Pourquoi le designer industriel a-t-il pens  incorporer une alarme lors des discussions sur les tudes de march et les ajustements dus aux nouvelles exigences du projet ?
en_summary: The market research implicated that users' biggest frustration was their failure in finding the remote control once it was lost in the house. To solve the problem, Industrial Designer suggested that a button could be added on the TV; when the user pressed the button, the remote control would beep to let the user know its location. Meanwhile, such a solution would be within budget.

Pour rsoudre le problme, le designer industriel a suggr d'ajouter un bouton sur le tlviseur; lorsque l'utilisateur appuie sur le bouton, la tlcommande met un bip pour informer l'utilisateur de son emplacement. En attendant, une telle solution serait dans les limites du budget.

en_query: What's the conclusion of the remote control style when discussing market research and adjustments due to new project requirements?
fr_query: Quelle est la conclusion du style de tlcommande lors de la discussion des tudes de march et des ajustements dus aux nouvelles exigences du projet ?
en_summary: Overall, the model style was expected to be trendy and appealing. Marketing and Project Manager agreed on User Interface's design of a flip-screen. Marketing also hoped that the remote control would be slightly curved. User Interface added that the remote control would curl up to users' hands so that their thumbs did not have to press. The corporate logo would be put in the corner. The model would be made of lightweight plastic with a smooth bottom and a nice scallop shell exterior.
fr_summary: Dans l'ensemble, le style du modle devait tre  la mode et attrayant. Le responsable marketing et le chef de projet se sont mis d'accord sur la conception d'un cran pivotant pour l'interface utilisateur. Le responsable marketing esprait galement que la tlcommande serait lgrement incurve. Le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur a ajout que la tlcommande se replierait sur les mains des utilisateurs afin que leurs pouces n'aient pas  appuyer. Le logo de l'entreprise serait mis dans le coin. Le modle serait fait de plastique lger avec un fond lisse et un bel extrieur en coquille Saint-Jacques.

en_query: Summarize the whole meeting.
fr_query: Rsumez toute la runion.
en_summary: This meeting was mainly about conceptual design. Industrial Designer, Marketing and User Interface gave presentations mainly on component design, current trend and interface design respectively, based on their research on the website incorporating the ideas from last meeting. A lot of discussions was centred around the fruit and vegetable theme, which was the current marketing trend. In the meanwhile, they had some discussions on physical attributes and the use of energy. They agreed that the screen was not necessary, and TV could be used as the screen instead.
fr_summary: Cette runion portait principalement sur le design conceptuel. Le designer industriel, le responsable marketing et le concepteur de l'interface utilisateur ont donn des prsentations principalement sur la conception de composants, la tendance actuelle et la conception d'interface respectivement, sur la base de leurs recherches sur le site Web incorporant les ides de la dernire runion. Beaucoup de discussions ont t centres sur le thme des fruits et lgumes, qui tait la tendance marketing actuelle. Entre-temps, ils ont eu des discussions sur les attributs physiques et l'utilisation de l'nergie. Ils ont convenu que l'cran n'tait pas ncessaire et que la tlvision pouvait tre utilise comme cran  la place.

en_query: What did the group discuss about the current trend and potential materials?
fr_query: Qua dit le groupe  propos de la tendance actuelle et des matriaux potentiels ?
en_summary: Marketing proposed that the fancy look and feel were more important than the functionality of the product. The fruit and vegetable theme was the current trend, and marketing himself preferred fruits to vegetables. Therefore, how spongy the material could be should be taken into consideration when choosing the materials. The potential materials to accomplish the fruit and vegetable theme could be a sort of rubber, which was used in the stress balls. The alternative option was to use a cover for it, and choose a colour that fits one's sitting room.
fr_summary: Le responsable marketing a propos que l'apparence et la sensation de fantaisie soient plus importantes que la fonctionnalit du produit. Le thme des fruits et lgumes tait la tendance actuelle, et le responsable marketing lui-mme prfrait les fruits aux lgumes. Par consquent, la spongiosit du matriau doit tre prise en compte lors du choix des matriaux. Les matriaux potentiels pour raliser le thme des fruits et lgumes pourraient tre une sorte de caoutchouc, qui a t utilis dans les balles anti-stress. L'option alternative tait d'utiliser une couverture pour cela et de choisir une couleur qui correspond  son salon.

Um, so we need some custom design parts, and other parts we'll just use standard. Um, I assume we'll be custom designing our case, probably a hard plastic or some other material case, to protect the remote and the locator. And we'll need to custom desi design a circuit board, because the circuit board has to take the button input and send it to the output so you have to design that each time. But once we come up with a design we'll send it to the circuit people and they'll just print it out. Um, standard parts include the buttons and the wheels, um the iPod-style wheel. The infrared L_E_D_ is actually gonna be included in the circuit board that comes with it. Um, we need a radio sender and receiver, those are standard. And al we also need a beeper or buzzer or other sort of noise thing for locating the remote. So we have some material options. Um, we can use rubber, plastic, wood or titanium. Um, I'd recommend against titanium because it can only be used in the flat cases and it's really heavy. Um, and the rubber case requires rubber buttons, so if we definitely want plastic buttons, we shouldn't have a rubber case.

industrial designer: hmm? Uh, well we can use wood. I don't know why we'd want to. We can't use the minimal chip, we need the next higher grade, which is called regular. I don't think it's much more expensive, but it is more expensive. So that's what I've got on design.
en_query: What did the Industrial Designer say about component design?
fr_query: Qu'a dit le designer industriel  propos de la conception de composants ?
en_summary: Industrial Designer thought some parts needed custom design, and other parts should just use standard. For example, the case needed custom design to protect the remote and the locator, and the circuit board needed custom design as well, while the buttons and the wheels, radio sender and receiver were all standard parts. In addition, beeper or other noise things were needed as well for locating the remote. Rubber, plastic, wood and titanium were options of materials, but better not titanium. Regular chips were required if the iPod-style wheel button was used.
fr_summary: Le designer industriel pensait que certaines pices ncessitaient une conception personnalise et que d'autres pices devaient simplement utiliser la norme. Par exemple, le botier ncessitait une conception personnalise pour protger la tlcommande et le localisateur, et le circuit imprim ncessitait galement une conception personnalise, tandis que les boutons et les molettes, l'metteur et le rcepteur radio taient tous des pices standard. De plus, un bipeur ou d'autres lments sonores taient galement ncessaires pour localiser la tlcommande. Le caoutchouc, le plastique, le bois et le titane taient des options de matriaux, mais mieux vallait ne pas utiliser pas le titane. Des puces rgulires taient ncessaires si le bouton de roue de style iPod tait utilis.
